_header: Jack Shep Trench Sovereign Tom Miller Tyler Jack Straw
_description: A satirical rhyme from the Peasants’ Revolt — one long couplet among similar rhyming lines in Latin

OxfCCC59.Transcription:
Jak schep trench souwrain thommellere tyler Jalke strawErl of þe
                    ple rakte deer & hob cartere rakestaw
